title: Who is really behind Bernie Sanders? - Quora

response.answer_text: Originally Answered: Who is really behind Bernie Sanders? A2A. Some global conspirators who want to put even more fluoride in your drinking water, make everyone gay by the power of suggestion, fake another moon landing, launch the black helicopters, vaccinate kids to make them autistic, claim the Earth is round, and put all of you Republicans in reeducation camps. The reason I know this is I’m one of those conspirators. Oops, I just laid bare all of our plans. I think I have less than 24 hours to live.

A diverse group of multi-ethnic, multi-religious, Democratic and independent voters. As seen in the Nevada primaries. Come November, we’ll be including Never Trumper Republicans among our coalition to remove Trump, at least. They will be more than welcome, however temporary their support. I wish them all the best in removing the corruption in the Republican party in primaries to come.
